summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Habitere real estate platform. Backend APIs working excellently (91.7% success rate) with 6 professional services loaded. Frontend fully functional with professional services carousel working perfectly across all pages with auto-scroll, manual navigation, and responsive design. All core user journeys from browsing properties to finding services working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: No sample properties available for testing property detail functionality
minor_issues.impact: Cannot test property detail pages, but properties listing endpoint works correctly

design_issues.issue: Some placeholder images failing to load due to DNS resolution issues
Some Unsplash images blocked by ORB (Origin Resource Blocking) policy

passed_tests: Backend API health check and root endpoints
Sample data initialization (6 professional services loaded)
Services listing and filtering with category filters
Service detail pages with full information display
Landing page hero section and navigation
Professional services carousel with auto-scroll (3-second intervals)
Responsive design across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Navigation between all pages (landing, properties, services, service details)
Category filtering on services page (8 categories available)
Service card navigation to detail pages
Protected route handling (dashboard redirects to landing when not authenticated)
Similar services section on service detail pages
Services carousel present on multiple pages (landing, properties, service details)
